duties_responsibilities.duty: Exceed Revenue and Margin quota targets within assigned territory
Identify prospective, high-volume referral sources in target disease areas for assigned area
Develop preferred relationships with identified high-volume referral sources and their support teams
Provide feedback to management on sales, market, and customer issues
Join and attend key professional organizations to increase visibility of the company and increase business opportunities
Provide / Coordinate Educational In-Services to accounts as needed
Attend sales and staff meetings and participate in sales conference calls as scheduled
Participate in exhibits and seminars to promote the company.
Collaborate with Business Development/Operations on new and existing business
Complete required administrative duties, including compliance with CRM use and expense reports

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree required in a life science, business/marketing, public relations, or communications
